resources.string: There was an error getting shared preferences. Please close the app and restart it.
We cleared your preferences for which app to send the text with. Next time you send a text, please select which app to use when the prompt comes up.
You cannot turn on location services right now because we do not have access to your phone\'s location. Would you like to give us access?

Turning off location here will stop the app from sending a link to your location but will not rescind the app\'s permission to access it. If you don\'t want the app to be able to access your location anymore, go to your phone\'s settings app and change the permissions there.
This app is useless without access to your contacts. Please give us permission to read your contacts.
This app needs the GPS services to be enabled in order to send your location. Please enable it on the Location Services screen.
Click to select contacts for Group

This app is a streamlined messaging app. It is not meant to be used instead of 911. \n This app uses code from an outside library te select multiple contacts in the settings page. The library we used, MultiContactPicker, is licensed under the Apache License 2.0. Here is the link to the github repository of the code we used:
This is an empty request. Scroll down to text box to populate with a new request.
This is an empty contact. Scroll down to text box to populate with a new contact.
There is nothing to delete. Scroll down to text box to create a new element
This is an empty contact view. Go to settings to populate this view
This is an empty request view. Go to settings to populate this view
You must enter a message in order to save it
Cannot save without a new contact group name
Choose a Message to Send. There are currently no saved messages to send
Set Requests. There are currently no saved requests
Choose a Group to Message. There are currently no contact groups to choose from
Set Contact Groups and Numbers. There are currently no saved contact groups
has been selected as your contacts group
has been selected as your message
Set Request Texts. There is currently no more room for new messages
Set Contacts and Numbers. There is currently no more room for new contact groups
